title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 12 January 2015 - XWiki
content:
<vmassol> has quit  
03:17 <martin-h> has joined #xwiki  
05:49 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
07:04 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
08:40 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:42 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:45 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
08:46 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
08:47 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
08:54 <vmassol> good morning  
08:56 <cjd> gm  
08:57 <mflorea> vmassol: good morning, can you take a look at http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/681/  
08:57 <vmassol> mflorea: thanks, checking  
08:58 <vmassol> fixing  
08:58 <mflorea> thanks  
09:01 <vmassol1> has joined #xwiki  
09:01 <vmassol> has quit  
09:03 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
09:04 <mflorea> ClemensR: good morning, anything left to do for http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-11547 . 6.4RC1 is planned for today.  
09:05 <mflorea> I've looked at your commits and they seem ok  
09:05 <ClemensR> sorry, I forgot  it is release today when I fixed it Friday ... what is missing is merging on the other branches  
09:05 <ClemensR> ok, if someone looked at them, I go and close the issue now ... and do the merges to the other branches later  
09:06 <mflorea> just don't forget about the merges after you close the issue  
09:07 <ClemensR> yes, going to do that now, just get the issue out of the release workflow  
09:08 <mflorea> [all] I'm looking at the failing xwiki-enterprise-test-selenium test, seems to be related to some label change.  
09:10 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:14 <ClemensR> it is likely to be this commit: https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/e960a178  ?  
09:15 <mflorea> ClemensR: yep, I updated the test  
09:15 <ClemensR> ah, ok, you found it before I even started :)  
09:15 <mflorea> :)  
09:19 <Pbas> has joined #xwiki  
09:19 <mflorea> I'm looking at the failing wysiwyg tests  
09:21 <mflorea> guys, please hold your commits on master for a few hours so that we can stabilize the master build and release 6.4RC1  
09:23 <Lyes> has joined #xwiki  
09:47 <tmortagne> mflorea: fixing failing tag UI  
09:47 <mflorea> ok  
09:53 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:57 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
09:58 <fmancinelli> has joined #xwiki  
10:00 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
10:00 <Denis1> is now known as <Denis>  
10:04 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:17 <vmassol1> mflorea: I need 30 minutes to finish something  
10:18 <mflorea> ok  
10:18 <mflorea> I'm still investigating the failing wysiwyg tests  
10:18 <vmassol1> ok  
10:20 <tmortagne> mflorea: I can reproduce RepositoryTest.testAddExtension failure locally, looking at it (at worst it's not really a big deal all seems OK expect a white space after the author name)  
10:21 <mflorea> ok  
10:21 <tmortagne> s/expect/except  
10:29 <lucaa> has quit  
10:29 <lucaa1> has joined #xwiki  
10:35 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:36 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:38 <Enygma`> has quit  
10:39 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:39 <Pbas> Hello. No one want my space character? http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-11498 and https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/pull/358 :-)  
10:49 <Enygma`> Pbas: today is 6.4RC1. After that is done and the master branch is free for the 7.x cycle, we can start committing improvements and such.  
10:49 <Enygma`> so this means that in 1-2 days we could apply your PR  
10:50 <Enygma`> hope that`s ok with you  
10:50 <Pbas> k. It means my PR won't be in 6.4 stable?  
10:53 <ClemensR> Pbas: yes, sorry, looks like it is not  
10:54 <tmortagne> cjd: Hi  
10:54 <Pbas> k. It doesn't matter it was a tiny space character. I add it on my Xwiki :-)  
10:54 <cjd> hi tmortagne, what's up?  
10:54 <ClemensR> maybe you can lobby to have it in 6.4.1 or so if you annoy^U^U^U^U^U remind people in chat often enough ;)  
10:55 <ClemensR> btw: I see that somehow I have been broken the build for 6.3-stable branch ... sorry. me looking into it  
10:55 <tmortagne> there is a question about filesystem storage on mailing list and indeed I don't see how this could work with big files since it seems to do a lot of attachment history stuff before even calling attachment store API  
10:56 <cjd> there is only one bug which breaks it, that is when you delete a document w/o deleting the attachments  
10:56 <tmortagne> it's in save here  
10:56 <tmortagne> in XWikiHibernateStore#saveAttachment  
10:57 <tmortagne> this method is calling XWikiAttachment#updateArchive which store several time the attachment en memory  
10:57 <tmortagne> so even if you enable filesystem attachment store I don't see how it could work with big file  
10:58 <cjd> XWikiAttachmentArchive and XWikiAttachmentContent are extended and all of that crap is overridden  
10:59 <tmortagne> I tough so but I Eclipse can't find me any filesystem extend of XWikiAttachmentArchive class  
10:59 <tmortagne> and he seems to have the right configuration  
11:00 <vmassol1> mflorea: I'm ok on my side for the RC release  
11:00 <tmortagne> cjd: it's "[xwiki-users] Can't make big uploads?"  
11:00 <vmassol1> is now known as <vmassol>  
11:02 <tmortagne> cjd: I think I found it actually, ListAttachmentArchive name was not obvious as a filesystem based implementation of attachment achive :)  
11:02 <cjd> feel free to rename it  
11:02 <tmortagne> so I don't understand why he ends up in standard XWikiAttachmentArchive  
11:03 <tmortagne> if you have any idea  
11:41 <gdelhumeau> Hello  
11:42 <gdelhumeau> It seems less4j has fixed all the bugs that I have reported  
11:42 <gdelhumeau> and when the new version will be released, I think we could be able to use it in XWiki  
11:43 <gdelhumeau> But it might be dangerous to integrate it so lately in the 6.x cycle  
11:43 <gdelhumeau> do you think we should do it in 7.x?  
11:44 <gdelhumeau> since we lack perspective?  
11:47 <tmortagne> +1 for 7.x  
12:33 <lucaa1> has quit  
12:35 <vmassol> yes 7.x  
12:48 <mflorea> gdelhumeau: was XWIKI-11601 critical for 6.4RC1?  
12:48 <mflorea> ah, I see you committed before  
12:49 <gdelhumeau> yes, it was a fix  
12:49 <mflorea> anyway, please try to hold your commits on master unless it's for fixing tests or critical bugs  
12:49 <gdelhumeau> I have a bug on the flamingo theme editor preview  
12:49 <gdelhumeau> introduced by some changes in M3 I think  
12:49 <gdelhumeau> I can fix it for either RC1 or final  
12:50 <mflorea> it depends if it's critical or not.  
12:51 <mflorea> if it's a regression then I guess it's critical enough  
12:51 <gdelhumeau> yes it is a regression  
12:51 <gdelhumeau> I'm fixing it  
12:52 <mflorea> ok  
12:57 <gdelhumeau> done. I don't commit anymore  
12:57 <gdelhumeau> sorry for that  
12:58 <gdelhumeau> now I'm going to write a test for that  
13:21 <woshilapin> has quit  
13:22 <gdelhumeau> but I'll commit it after the release  
13:25 <ClemensR> I do not understand what I might have broken in the stable-6.3 branch in http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform-6.3.x/72/  ... but before I retrigger jenkins to see if it just a flicker I better wait till the 6.4-rc1 is out - I guess the build agents are better kept busy with the master builds yet ...  
13:32 <mflorea> ClemensR: that is know problems. the package module fails sometimes. It will pass if we trigger a full rebuild of the platform. But let's leave this for after 6.4RC1  
13:33 <ClemensR> mflorea: ah, thanks, good to know. I was worried I might have introduces some bug  
13:36 <ClemensR> anyone knows if Victor is working on  ADMINTOOL-1 issue? I got some users over here which got bitten by that bug and would like to see a fix ... so I would like to fix it, but I don't want to create double work  
13:39 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
13:42 <Lyes> has quit  
13:45 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki  
13:46 <Enygma`> has quit  
13:46 <Enygma`1> has joined #xwiki  
13:47 <gsmeria> has quit  
13:47 <Enygma`1> is now known as <Enygma`>  
13:58 <tmortagne> ClemensR: I doubt Victor is working on it  
13:59 <tmortagne> he assigned himself more than 1 year ago  
13:59 <ClemensR> tmortagne: ok, I guess I can just reassign to myself and see what happens ;)  
13:59 <Enygma`> ClemensR: asked Victor. A PR exists and he is not working on it anymore. You are free to take it  
13:59 <Enygma`> would probably be a good idea to check that PR and see if there is anything reusable  
14:00 <ClemensR> ah, ok, thanks ... did not know about the PR ... checking  
14:00 <Enygma`> Added the PR as a comment to the issue  
14:00 <Enygma`> https://github.com/xwiki-contrib/application-admintools/pull/6  
14:00 <vmassol> sdumitriu: ping  
14:01 <ClemensR> Enygma`:  ok, thanks, found it !  
14:02 <vmassol> sdumitriu: back then you implemented the share page feature as a template and I wonder why since it's not a feature we need if the DB is empty  
14:03 <silverdrop> has joined #xwiki

17:38 <vmassol> sdumitriu: ok
